::KitKat::

She was hit in the hip while in wolf mode.  She let out a loud yelp and took 
cover behind a tree near Quickstrike. She looked at him and looked at his 
leg.
"Your in worse shape than I am. If you will take me wth you, I'll cover you 
and let you start to get on out of here."
She transformed into bot mode and pulled out an energon rifle. She returned 
fire.
"Oh, By the way, I'm KitKat.  Nice to meet you."
She fired a few more rounds at the spotted bot.
"Go on, I'll be right behind you."
She kept firing so that Quickstrike could get a head start towards the base. 
  KitKat planned on following him tohis base and use the CR chamber once 
Quickstrike was done wit it.

"Can you make or do you need help? That legs looks very bad."



---------Original Message-------
From: Talon Harvilicz  <wilddance_mare@h...>
Date: Tue Jun 27, 2000 2:39am
Subject: Neo Beast Wars

(Sorry guys, driving school held me up.)

Quickstrike/Cheetor:

Quickstrike was surprised to see another bot coming out of the forest, going
for the Maximal. She sounded Predacon, thank Primus. He gave her quick eye
contact. She ran at the spot where Cheetor was twice. The third time, he saw
him rush out. He heard him growl, throwing his legs out to run. That was
Cheetor? But that thing was nothing but a pile of fur and spots.

"What in tarnation?"

But after a few seconds some of it made some sense. Before the youth had a
flight mode, being all metal, he was once a pure cheetah.

He ran after him. He fired at the youth, at his flank. But the shot went
past him.

He saw the youth spin around and transform. He withdrew a gun and fired at
them. He fired at KitKat, then three times at himself. Quickstrike nearly
stumbled. He almost lost his leg from the shot, but he managed to dash to a
tree.
